name: heimdall
description: Heimdall is a self hosted application dashboard for organizing links to your services. It automatically detects many apps to show status and logos, making a clean, centralized homepage for homelab or server environments.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Centralized homepage for organizing links to all your self-hosted services

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Display service status and availability directly on dashboard tiles

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Use built-in icon library or upload custom logos for your applications

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find and access services with integrated search

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Add and organize services through a simple web interface
